name: MAIN
code:
LOOP AT lt_header INTO ls_header.
  SELECT * FROM mara INTO TABLE lt_mara WHERE matnr = ls_header-matnr.
  LOOP AT lt_mara INTO ls_mara.
    WHILE sy-index < 5.
      DO 3 TIMES.
        WRITE: / ls_mara-matnr.
      ENDDO.
    ENDWHILE.
  ENDLOOP.
ENDLOOP.

SELECT * FROM marc FOR ALL ENTRIES IN lt_header WHERE matnr = lt_header-matnr.
